name: Tween3D
shortDescription: Smoothly animate scale and rotation of 3d models.
description: Change models proportions and orientation over time to make smooth animations.

eventsFunctions.description: the stretch on Z axis. The object volume is conserved. A stretch of 2 makes the object appear 2 times longer on Z in proportion to the dimensions on X and Y.
eventsFunctions.name: StretchZ
eventsFunctions.sentence: the stretch on Z axis of _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: the stretch on Y axis. The object volume is conserved. A stretch of 2 makes the object appear 2 times longer on Y in proportion to the dimensions on X and Z.
eventsFunctions.name: StretchY
eventsFunctions.sentence: the stretch on Y axis of _PARAM1_

eventsFunctions.description: the scale volume.
eventsFunctions.name: ScaleVolume

eventsFunctions.description: Exponentially tween bewteen 2 values according to an easing function.
eventsFunctions.name: EaseExp

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Smoothly animate scale and rotation of 3d models.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Tween3D

eventsFunctions.description: Tweens an object stretch Z from its current value to a new one. The stretch can never be 0 or less.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenStretchZ
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tween the stretch Z of object _PARAM0_ to _PARAM3_ over _PARAM4_ seconds with _PARAM5_ easing as _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Tweens an object stretch Y from its current value to a new one. The stretch can never be 0 or less.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenStretchY
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tween the stretch Y of object _PARAM0_ to _PARAM3_ over _PARAM4_ seconds with _PARAM5_ easing as _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Tweens an object scale volume from its current value to a new one. The scale volume can never be 0 or less.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenScaleVolume
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tween the scale volume of object _PARAM0_ to _PARAM3_ over _PARAM4_ seconds with _PARAM5_ easing as _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Tweens an object rotation X from its current value to a new one.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenRotationX
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tween the rotation X of object _PARAM0_ to _PARAM3_ over _PARAM4_ seconds with _PARAM5_ easing as _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Tweens an object rotation Y from its current value to a new one.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenRotationY
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tween the rotation Y of object _PARAM0_ to _PARAM3_ over _PARAM4_ seconds with _PARAM5_ easing as _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: the tweened value
eventsFunctions.name: TweenedValue

eventsFunctions.description: the exponent-tweened value
eventsFunctions.name: ExponentTweenedValue
StartTween
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tween the _PARAM6_ of object _PARAM0_ to _PARAM3_ over _PARAM4_ seconds with _PARAM5_ easing as _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.name: Type

eventsFunctions.name: Easing

eventsFunctions.name: TargetedValue

eventsFunctions.name: IsPaused

eventsFunctions.description: Change if the tween is paused
eventsFunctions.name: SetPaused

eventsFunctions.description: Stop the running tween animation.
eventsFunctions.name: StopTween

eventsFunctions.description: Pause the running tween animation.
eventsFunctions.name: PauseTween

eventsFunctions.description: Resume the tween animation.
eventsFunctions.name: ResumeTween

eventsFunctions.description: Remove the tween animation from the object.
eventsFunctions.name: RemoveTween

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the tween animation exists.
eventsFunctions.name: Exists

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the tween animation is currently playing.
eventsFunctions.name: IsPlaying

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the tween animation has finished playing.
eventsFunctions.name: HasFinished

eventsFunctions.description: the progress of a tween (between 0.0 and 1.0).
eventsFunctions.name: Progress

eventsFunctions.description: Return the tween identifier for a given index.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenIdentifier

eventsFunctions.description: Invalidate tween identifiers.
eventsFunctions.name: InvalidateTweenIdentifiers

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Squash and stretch a 3D model in loop.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Wobble

eventsFunctions.description: the minimum scale volume of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: ScaleMin

eventsFunctions.description: the maximum scale volume of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: ScaleMax

eventsFunctions.description: Tweens the minimum scale volume from its current value to a new one. The scale volume can never be 0 or less.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenScaleMin
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tween the minimum scale volume of object _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ over _PARAM3_ seconds with _PARAM4_ easing

eventsFunctions.description: Tweens the maximum scale volume from its current value to a new one. The scale volume can never be 0 or less.
eventsFunctions.name: TweenScaleMax
eventsFunctions.sentence: Tween the maximum scale volume of object _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ over _PARAM3_ seconds with _PARAM4_ easing

eventsFunctions.description: the cycle duration of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: PeriodDuration

eventsFunctions.description: the scale cycle offset of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: ScalePeriodOffset
